params.label: News
params.generic_share: What did you learn this year? There's only one way to find out. Try this quiz.
params.title: 2014 end of year News quiz

results.share_text: Things happened this year and clearly I missed the memo. How'd you do?
results.text: You were awake some this year, right?

results.share_text: Time to close my Netflix screen and read a little. What's your score?
results.text: A little less Netflix and a little more news, OK?

results.share_text: So close, yet so far. Maybe it's time to pick up a newspaper. Test your knowledge.
results.text: OK, you can toss around headlines at a dinner party.

results.share_text: I'm pretty much USA TODAY. Think you can top me?
results.text: Nice! You've got this current events thing down.

questions.value: This attorney, representing the family of Michael Brown, gained national attention when he represented the family of Trayvon Martin in 2012.
Who won season 19 of Dancing With the Stars?
Alibaba became the biggest U.S. IPO in history earlier this year. So, what exactly is Alibaba?
Two Malaysia Airline disasters killed more than 500 people in 2014. In both incidents, the jets were shot down over Ukraine.
In which countries has the Ebola outbreak officially been declared over?
